msbt.message: Oh man, I'm so tiredbut I've gotta pull it together. The tourney is starting soon! Maybe sleeping with my fishing pole in the bed wasn't the best idea after all
Alright, get it together, .Just keep pacing nervously and everything will work out in the Fishing Tourney
It's starting, The Fishing Tourney!I don't even really like catching fish, but I LOVE a good tournament! Oh, by the way, it starts at 9:00 AM.

So here's my philosophy on catching fish for the Fishing Tourney in a nutshell If you examine the moral teachings of some of the 18th century's pre-eminent thinkers you'd be super bored! Just go catch some fish, !
Hey, how's the Fishing Tourney going for you? Reel sizzling and all that?
I've probably passed on trying to catch 100 fish today.I mean, yeah, I could be winning the whole tourney. But I want to win it in STYLE, !

Whew! What an event that was. I had no idea I'd do so well! And I couldn't have done it without my fans. Do you know if the MVP award is a trophy, or a medal, or? I just need to free up some space in my display.
I don't know about you, but I'd rather be caught than the one doing the catching, . Ha HA Er
How'd you do in the tourney today, hmm?The results may not show up on paper, but I truly feel that I won the event in my own way.
Don't you just love the push and pull of a competition like this? The give and take? The win and lose? Sorry, I'm just trying to make conversation. I don't know anything about sports.
Yo, you don't have time to chat right now, ! You've got a tourney to win!
It was an electric feeling, just for the blink of an eye, almost like being struck by lightning Oh, just talking about the one that got away. It was THIS BIG!
When you're fishing, you don't want to scare off the fish, you know? You've got to be smooth. If you get too close too soon, you'll just freak them out. We're still talking about fishing, .
Reeled in any big fish lately? And no. You can't say me.Though I would prefer to keep this small pond all to myself.
Ah, the distinct and natural aroma of fish There's nothing quite like it, and for that I am grateful.
I gotta be honestfishing doesn't really come naturally to me.But please don't tell anyone I said that! It's listed on my resume under "Special Talents," .
I love how events like this bring our little together.It almost makes it worth the lingering smell of fish that now follows me everywhere I go, .
